channel.title: How is this possible

item.title: How is this possible

item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

So, Iâ€™m kinda refactoring the 317 client. And I found this method.

public byte method429() { return (byte) (-buffer[bufferPosition++]); }
How the heck is it possible to make an array negative? (-buffer[bufferPosition++])

Or, does this just make the byte negative if positive, and positive if negative. What should I name it then?!
